room_title: Escape room "Pirate's Plunder" by MacGyver's Great Escape in Florence (KY)
review: We did the Pirates Plunder and it was a blast!This was a awesome family fun night. We will definitely be back for more fun!

room_title: Escape room "Pirate's Plunder" by MacGyver's Great Escape in Florence (KY)
review: Me and two of my friends did the Pirate Plunder. We had so much fun. We will be back to do The Test very soon.

room_title: Escape room "Pirate's Plunder" by MacGyver's Great Escape in Florence (KY)
review: We did the pirate's plunder room, we loved it and had a blast. The puzzles were challenging and the staff couldn't be more friendly or inviting! They really went above and beyond to make this a pleasant experience. I will definitely be going again soon!
